        @GetMapping(value="/map")
 @ResponseBody
public com.google.gson.JsonObject getMap()
        It gives to the client map's details
        Returns:
        JsonObject with map's components if everything is ok or error string if something is wrong

        @GetMapping(value="/turnStatus")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation.SseEmitter handleSseTurn()

      • placeTanks

        @PostMapping(value="/initialTanksPlacement")
 @ResponseBody
public com.google.gson.JsonObject placeTanks(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        It allows player to place tanks in the initial phase of the game, before that any turn start
        Parameters:
        request - HttpServletRequest with the session and the body
        Returns:
        JsonObject with the player status if everything is ok, error string with error if something is wrong

      • getPlayerInfo

        @GetMapping(value="/playerInfo")
 @ResponseBody
public com.google.gson.JsonObject getPlayerInfo(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        It allows client to get his own info
        Parameters:
        request - HttpServletRequest with player session
        Returns:
        JsonObject with all player info or with error string with the error if something is wrong

      • playPhase

        @PostMapping(value="/playPhase")
 @ResponseBody
public com.google.gson.JsonObject playPhase(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        It allows player to play the current phase
        Parameters:
        request - HttpServletRequest with player session and body that contains what player have done in the client
        Returns:
        JsonObject with his info or with error message

      • nextPhase

        @GetMapping(value="/nextPhase")
 @ResponseBody
public com.google.gson.JsonObject nextPhase(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        It allow player to change the current phase with the next phase, or to pass the turn to another player
        Parameters:
        request - HttpServletRequest with player session
        Returns:
        JsonObject with OK message or with error message
